doc.name: revBrowserSnapshot
doc.summary: Takes a snapshot of the current browser page.

examples.example: set the imageData of image "Browser Thumbnail" to tSnapshot

description.p: The revBrowserSnapshot command takes a snapshot of the page currently being displayed in the specified browser object.
The instanceId is the integer identifier of a browser object.
The variableName is the name of a variable to place the resulting image data into.
The revBrowserSnapshot command puts empty into the result.
The variableName should be the name of a declared variable. This means that before calling revBrowserSnapshot a variable to place the image data into should be declared using the local command.
